title: region leaders can be banished in an election timeout when rolling upgrade a cluster
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
master

The log files is in the attachment. It shows a region 27073. At `18:28:43` one replica starts an pre-election, and then the the region leader is banished about 10s.

After some investigations, I think it's caused by an issue of hibernate regions.

[27073.zip](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/files/8252692/27073.zip)
